attributes.action: Tax payers data: Do not sell & do not change the law.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is about wanting the Government to NOT sell our private data and NOT to change the current legal system in order to be allowed to do so.

The Government has been linked with selling tax payers data to private companies.  In order to do this, the Government will need to change the law!  That's right, the Government will change our laws to legalise the sale of our data.

Do you think this is correct?
Do you think this is good use of our legal system?
Do you want your data (your personal data) to be sold?

If not, please sign this petition - it will take a couple of minutes!  Petitions DO WORK, so please share, pass on ... and sign!

With absolute appreciation,

Scott Kemp
